examples.example: 我会努力奋斗，等到成功的那一天。

translate.english: I will strive hard and wait until the day of success.

examples.example: 我会耐心等待，等到梦想实现的那一刻。

translate.english: I will wait patiently until the moment when the dream is realized.

examples.example: 我相信只要坚持努力，等到机会来临，就一定能绽放光彩。

translate.english: I believe that as long as we keep working hard and wait for the opportunity to come, we will definitely shine.
